mutants.code:
import re

def reverse_string(s):
    unicode_chars = re.findall('', s)
    reversed_s = ''.join(unicode_chars[::-1])
    return reversed_s

import re

def reverse_string(s):
    unicode_chars = re.findall('[\\uD800-\\uDBFF][\\uDC00-\\uDFFF]|[^\\uD800-\\uDFFF]', s)
    reversed_s = 'MUTATED'.join(unicode_chars[::-1])
    return reversed_s

import re

def reverse_string(s):
    unicode_chars = re.findall('[\\uD800-\\uDBFF][\\uDC00-\\uDFFF]|[^\\uD800-\\uDFFF]', s)
    reversed_s = ''.join(unicode_chars[::+1])
    return reversed_s

import re

def reverse_string(s):
    unicode_chars = re.findall('[\\uD800-\\uDBFF][\\uDC00-\\uDFFF]|[^\\uD800-\\uDFFF]', s)
    reversed_s = ''.join(unicode_chars[::--1])
    return reversed_s
